source.absolute_timeline_notes: Immediately after Demmy reaches the cells at Calum-Tam Holdfast; nighttime evacuation begins.

text_windows.full_scene_clean: Pain saturates Chase as Quincy urges him up—Demmy has arrived. In total darkness he’s hauled to his feet; agony spikes through his left arm and a racking cough wrings more pain from his chest. Demmy warns of a dead body ahead; Chase’s feet bump over it as Quincy and Demmy drag him toward wooden steps linking the holding pens above to the cells below. Every step jolts his dangling arm. Disoriented, nauseated, and exhausted, Chase wants to sleep, but they keep him moving. They push through doors and emerge into the dimly lit streets of the holdfast.
text_windows.dense_recap_250w: From Chase’s pain-blurred perspective, Quincy rouses him with urgent news: Demmy is here. The cell block is in blackout, and Chase can barely see; one eye is blurry and both are nearly swollen shut. As Quincy and Demmy lift him under the arms, a spike of agony tears through his left arm and a violent cough compounds his pain. Demmy hisses a warning about a corpse up ahead—“don’t trip”—and the trio shuffle forward, Chase’s feet knocking against the body before they reach a flight of wooden stairs. The steps connect the upper holding pens to the lower cells; each upward movement sends fresh shockwaves through Chase’s injuries. Disoriented and nauseated, he fades in and out, whispers that it hurts, and nearly begs for oblivion, but Quincy and Demmy keep him moving. They shoulder him through interior doors and out into the dimly lit streets of the Calum-Tam Holdfast, transitioning the rescue from the subterranean confinement to the surface, where the escape will continue. The scene focuses on endurance, urgency, and teamwork under dire physical strain, with environmental hazards (darkness, obstacles, stairs) and the constant risk of collapse from Chase’s condition.
text_windows.query_handle: In blackout, Demmy and Quincy drag injured Chase past a corpse, up holding-pen stairs, and out to Calum-Tam’s streets.

narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Move now despite injuries or risk failing the escape.

narrative_beats.what_happens: They drag Chase up wooden steps linking pens to cells; each step amplifies his arm pain.

narrative_beats.label: Surface exit
narrative_beats.what_happens: They push through doors into dimly lit holdfast streets.
narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Transition from confinement to open-area escape under time pressure.

characters.goals_now: Stay conscious and mobile enough to be evacuated.
characters.obstacles: Severe pain, likely arm and rib injuries, nausea, near-blindness in darkness.
characters.tactics: Yield to assistance; conserve energy; focus on breathing and steps.

relationships.evidence: Quincy rouses and supports him physically.
Demmy guides and warns him about hazards.

characters.goals_now: Get Chase moving and out of the cell block.
characters.obstacles: Total darkness, Chase’s injuries, physical burden of lifting/dragging.
characters.tactics: Direct verbal prompts; lift under arms; steady him on stairs.

embedding_payloads.text: Quincy rouses a badly hurt Chase in blackout conditions as Demmy arrives to extract them. They lift Chase under the arms, pass a corpse in the corridor, and climb the wooden stairs linking holding pens and cells. Each step intensifies Chase’s pain, but they push through interior doors into the dimly lit streets of the Calum-Tam Holdfast to continue the escape.

Actors: Chase (injured POV), Quincy (rescuer), Demmy (rescuer/guide). Locations: Calum-Tam cellblock (blackout), holding-pen stairs (vertical obstacle), Calum-Tam streets (exterior). Objects: doors, wooden stairs, unidentified corpse. Dynamics: urgent evacuation under injury and darkness.

Gritty third-limited through Chase’s pain-hazed senses; terse, urgent dialogue and heavy sensory detail (coughs, jolts, darkness). Themes of endurance and loyalty drive a hazardous ascent from confinement to open ground.
